"Craft Information":
"About Craft Information

From this screen, you can find players from whom to order crafts with \"Crafter Search\", view your crafting recipes and licenses, and receive crafted items that you ordered.

You cannot perform crafts yourself from the Visiphone. You must use your My Room Terminal.

[Link to online manual]
